concept.title: 212.203 Procedures for solicitation, evaluation, and award.

conbody.p: (1) See 215.101-2-70 for the limitations and prohibitions on the use of the lowest price technically acceptable source selection process, which are applicable to the acquisition of commercial items.
(2) See 217.7801 for the prohibition on the use of reverse auctions for personal protective equipment and aviation critical safety items.
